Name: Velours de France
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into a chilled glass.
Review: Almond and vanilla liqueur combine harmoniously with cognac with lime juice and bitters adding freshness and balance.
History: Created in 2015 by Edgar Pacheco of World Class Bar Celebrity Cruises, Mexico.
Nutrition: One serving of Velours de France contains 179 calories
Garnish: Demerara sugar rim & lemon zest twist (discarded)
